text: Va kasone, ki ʙa Alloh va pajomʙaronas imon ovardaand va mijoni hec jake az pajomʙaronas farqe nanihodand, onho siddiqonand. Va sahidon dar nazdi Parvardigorason hastand. Baroi onhost podosason va nurason ruzi qijomat. Va onhoe, ki kofir sudand va ojoti Moro duruƣ sumoridand, na ʙarojason podos va na nur ast, ʙalki onho sohiʙoni cahannamand
